                    - Stage II Vulvar Cancer: Treatment of stage II vulvar cancer may include the following:         -  Radical local excision and removal of nearby lymph nodes.    -  Modified radical vulvectomy or radical vulvectomy for large tumors. Nearby lymph nodes may
